Package nsu.odnostorontseva

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsu.odnostorontseva.Deck
  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Representing a deck of cards in a game. Provides functionality for creating, shuffling, picking up cards, adding cards, and checking if the deck is empty.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deck​(boolean makeDeck)
      creates a new deck of cards.
